description:
● Haohmaru, Ukyo Tachibana, Nakoruru, and many other iconic characters from the SAMURAI SHODOWN Series come back in SD version! Even this boss character !?
 
● Every character can be played in two different ways to double the fun!

● "Collection Cards" that allow to customize your characters can be unlocked after fulfilling specific conditions. Get them all!

● Compete against friends in epic battles in tabletop and handheld modes!
name: SAMURAI SHODOWN!2
